1.0.name: wordpress/kazooky-loyalty-rewards
1.0.description:
TOTALLY FREE! - WE CAN NEVER BE BEATEN ON PRICE

KAZOOKY'S FREE LOYALTY AND REWARDS SOLUTION FOR YOUR WEBSITE Kazooky Loyalty has released it free Loyalty & Rewards solution totally free of charge. All you have to do is download and install the plugin and you are ready to go.

$100 FREE PROMOTION

Kazooky Loyalty gives you a $100 promotion that you can add to your web site totally FREE Every single plugin install will come with its own $$$$ promotion so you can start immediately offering a reason for your visitors to engage with your website.

FACEBOOK SHARING - TWITTER SHARING - GOOGLE+ SHARING The Kazooky Loyalty plugin quickly and easily turns your Wordpress site and blog into an engaging hub of content and rewards. Your web visitors and customers will come back over and over again. Through integrated incentivized social sharing bu
